statements: DELETE FROM energy_monitoring WHERE sustainability_initiatives = 'solar panels';
DELETE FROM energy_monitoring WHERE hotel_id = 123 AND energy_usage > 100
DELETE FROM energy_monitoring WHERE sustainability_initiatives = 'Green Energy'
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100 AND room_number = 101;
DELETE FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE implementation_date < '2022-01-01' AND initiative_name = 'Solar Panels';
DELETE FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Eco-Friendly Lighting'
DELETE FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE description IS NULL;
